actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain cooperative housing corporations to replace conventional financing with tax-exempt financing.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow refinancing by qualified cooperative housing corporations with tax-exempt mortgage subsidy bond proceeds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain cooperative housing corporations to replace conventional financing with tax-exempt financing.
